modName: Fallout Sounds and Music For Skyrim - DELETED
summary: A mod that replaces menu sounds and some music with those from the Fallout games.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]Fallout Sounds For Skyrim
[/size]
[size=4]I recently started playing Skyrim and while I really enjoy the gameplay and feel to it I missed the feel of Fallout so I have created this mod to replace most of the menu sounds and music to those from the Fallout games.
So far sounds I have added are from Fallout 4 and Fallout New Vegas.

[/size][youtube]K0_xssfCEFk[/youtube]

[size=5]Be happy like Skamp here and enjoy Fallout Sounds in the Elder Scrolls Universe.[/size]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/87534-0-1509023499.png[/img]
